projects.title: Projects
projects.exhaustive: Non exhaustive list of my projects
projects.owl:
In a group of 9

OWL is a mobile application that help preventing drowsiness while driving.

It monitors the driver's condition with the help of the user's smartwatch and phone.

It uses the smartwatch's sensors to detect the driver's heart rate and the app inbuilt navigation system to detect the driver's driving pattern.
If the driver is detected to be drowsy, the application will alert the driver and advise them to take a break, or redirect them to the nearest rest area.
projects.community_app:
Alone
Technos : NuxtJS, TypeScript, NodeJS, PostgreSQL, TailwindCSS, Express

CommunityApp is a website that allows users to share posts with other users.

Users can create chat rooms to just chat with others, meeting rooms to set an event, or sell rooms to sell their items.
On each rooms, users can post a comment to share his thoughts.

The user also have a profile page, where others users can comment on his profile
To use the website, users need to have an account.
projects.generathon:
Alone
Technos : NextJS, TypeScript, TailwindCSS

The app is a cluster of generator, the user is able to use the differents generator to generate what he want from the possible choices. Each generators page have a unique design waiting for the user to figure it out. The user can use pets generator to generate a cute picture of a pet, or the books generator to find his favorite book using filters.
projects.task_organiser:
Alone
Technos : ReactJS, TypeScript, NodeJS, MongoDB, Express

TaskOrganiser is a website that allows users to create multiple tasks list.

Users can create tasks list and inside it to create tasks, add categories to them to filter tasks, setting deadline.

The user need to have an account to use the website. Using Google Authentification or a classic email/password.
projects.rtype:
In a group of 4
Technos : C++, SFML, Docker, Networking, Multithreading

R-Type is a horizontal scrolling shoot'em up.

The game is networked and can be played by up to 4 players. The goal is to reach the end of the level by destroying all the enemies in the way.
Using multithreading and a custom ECS engine, the game is able to handle a large amount of entities and projectiles.
The project also uses packaging tools to create a distributable version of the game.
projects.indiestudio:
In a group of 6
Technos : C++, Raylib

IndieStudio is a bomberman like game in 3D.
The game can be played by up to 4 players using keyboards or controllers.

The goal is to be the last player alive by placing bombs to destroy the map and the other players.
The player can also play against bot to train.
projects.zappy:
In a group of 6
Technos : C++, C, C#, Unity, Networking

Zappy is a game where the player is a robot that needs to collect resources to level up and be able to evolve.
The player can also attack other robots to steal their resources.

The game is networked and can be played by multiple players. All players are controlled by AIs
projects.glados:
In a group of 5
Technos : Haskell

The goal of this project is to write from scratch a new language compiler.
This project consists in imaging and programming a new logical but also a unique syntax.
We inspired ourselves from S-Expression and add some syntactic sugars.
projects.rpg:
In a group of 4
Technos : C, CSFML

My RPG like the name suggests is a RPG game with a story, quests, levels, battles, dungeons, equipments, potions, skills.
The game is in 2D and the player can move in 4 directions.
The battles are turn by turn, with differents animations and sounds effect for each attacks or skills.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.fekamt:
(European Karate-do and Traditional Martial Arts Federation)

 Remote working
Technos : HTML, CSS, JS, PHP

 The Fekamt is a organisation with a numerous amount members across all Europe. The Fekamt uses a website to manage its members, events and news.

 My responsibilities were to maintain and improve the website, as well as to develop new features. Such as members filtering, pdf creation out of the members list.
I also had to write the documentation for the website, for new developers to be able to work on the website.
